title: Drawing, "Train Yourself To Better Work, for London Transport", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache on thick cream paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Possibly a study for a poster, depicting a celestial globe on a stand before a grid, a hand seen foreshortened pointing at the observer at the left; segment of a column in the foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Train Yourself To Better Work, for London Transport", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and gouache on thick cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-904.
